clinical_history: Assessment for renal calculus or hydronephrosis.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 21.75 bpm.
Right kidney demonstrates mildly heterogeneous, no hydronephrosis.
Breast tissue shows ill-defined lesion measuring 24.05 mm.
Prostate is unremarkable; volume approximately 30.52 cc.
Testes are hyperechoic with normal vascularity.
